column1: Time elapsed with both fleets in contact with each other.\n\nThe peak performance time of reinforcements is reduced by half of the combat time.
Number of marines in the fleet.
Number of crew in the fleet, and the number needed to meet the minimum requirements on all ships in the fleet.
Available supplies and supply use per day.
Jump points can be used to transit between hyperspace and normal space. Some jump points also lead to other destinations.
The gravity well of a star is deep enough to provide a one-way exit from hyperspace. Using one is, however, extremely difficult and dangerous.
The gravity well of a gas giant is often deep enough to provide a one-way exit from hyperspace.
